resources.string: Android powers hundreds of millions @asfasf #asfasf of mobile devices @asfasf #safasf in more than 190 countries around the world. It\'s the largest installed base of any mobile platform and growing fastâ€”every day another million users power up their Android devices for the first time and start looking for apps, games, and other digital content. Android gives you a world-class platform for @asfs #asfasf creating apps and games for Android users everywhere, as well as an open marketplace for distributing to them instantly.
